name: THE ART OF LIE - WHAT'S IN ERNESTO'S HEAD?
description: Special item for #oBRjkt! This was my third digital artwork criticizes the lying testimonies during “CPIpalooza”. This time, our character is former foreign relations minister Ernesto Araújo, who was summoned to the ongoing parliamentary investigation to hear about his participation (or lack of it) during the COVID-19 pandemic in Brazil.So, whats in his head? I tell you: Bannon, Trump and that old dude Olavo, the coward who lives in Virginia.
